description:
Mars` Space Force isn`t happy about space monsters showing up on their doorstep, and they blame the Fraternity. Lal`c is questioned about the role of Topless in the attack, and Nono proves whether she`s got heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Don`t Want to Be an Onee-sama
お姉さまなんかになりたくない
